name: Commission established
text: There shall be a board which shall be known as the state boxing commission of Hawaii.  The commission shall consist of five members.  One of the members shall be a member of the Hawaiian association of an amateur athletic federation of the United States of America.  One member shall be designated by the governor as chairperson of the commission. [L 1929, c 216, §1; RL 1935, §6991; am L 1937, c 213, §1; RL 1945, §7552; am L 1951, c 307, §2; RL 1955, §165-2; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §5; HRS ; am L 1983, c 241, §2; am L 1992, c 202, §46]
